text: Washington Terrace is a city in Utah, United States. The city was developed in 1942 during a war-time housing project. Washington Terrace is located in Weber County. The city has a total area of 1.9 square miles.About Washington Terrace Retrieved 12 August 2018 As of the 2020 census, 9,267 people live in Washington Terrace. ==References== Category:1942 establishments in the United States Category:Cities in Utah Category:20th-century establishments in Utah
title: Washington Terrace, Utah
